{{ardayearheader: * The [[Elves]] are unwilling to heed the summons of [[Oromë]] and leave [[Middle-earth]] for [[Aman]]. Therefore, Oromë invites three chieftains to join him on a visit to [[Valinor]]: [[Ingwë]], [[Finwë]] and [[Thingol
* After speaking to the [[Valar]] and seeing the light of the [[Two Trees]], the three chieftains see the awe and splendour of Valinor.<ref name="Annals"/>
